86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Uqba bin Al-Harith:An-Nu`man or the son of An-Nu`man was brought to the Prophet (ﷺ) on a charge of drunkenness. So the Prophet ordered all the men present in the house, to beat him. So all of them beat him, and I was also one of them who beat him with shoes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَمَرَ بِضَرْبِ الْحَدِّ فِي الْبَيْتِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever ordered that the legal punishment was to be carried out at home
